text:
Hi,

Kaafi chaapu aadmi hai be tum. One of the few people with whom I can talk about every random topic (history, economics, politics etc..).

2nd sem se apna jaan pehchaan hai thik se. Kaafi courses me apan saath me the, jisme mostly tum hi kar deta tha. Ek baar Deba ka assignment karne ke liye ke Antaragni bhi nhi gaye the. :(  Common courses me kaafi help bhi kiya tum, thanks for that. Always the “helper of last resort”. 

Aur bhi kaafi kuch hai, CCD, cold coffee, toaster, saanp se bachna xD. 

Milte hain Gurgaon me!!

Best wishes,
Srinjay
author: Srinjay  Kumar

text:
Hi,

Pehli baar to shayad 1st sem me hi mile the. Ghar almost har baar saath me hi jaate the. (Ekbaar tum galat train me ticket le liya tha). Kaafi gap kiye random topics pe (History, politics etc.). Tm bhi meri tarah thoda kharab start kiye the but baad me sudhaar liye.

Best of luck for your future.
author: Srinjay  Kumar

text:
Hi bro,

We did not know each other better till the 5th semester till you joined us in our wing. Since we had the same department, most of our courses were the same. We discussed a lot of random stuff many times. 
Thanks for the memories that we made together including submitting assignments at the last moment, visiting CCD, canteen to have a break. 

Best of luck for your future. Hope you achieve everything you want in your life.
Srinjay Kumar
author: Srinjay  Kumar

text:
Adde bhai,

Hope ki sb badiya hoga.

Through the years, kaafi courses me collaborate kiye, by the way, DS ke assignment 2 me thoda plag ho gaya tha xD. 
Aur CS 251 ka lab, do TA, ek Abhijeet aur ek koi aur bahut liya tha free ka. 
Aur Compiler me TA ko ch***** banaye the abstract tree banane me. 

Aur bhi kaafikuch hai, Z square, CCD, Domino’s, 2nd year waale summer me Deba ka project. Saath me internship ka interview dena. Finally, hua bhi hmlog ka same day hi.

Hopefully, milenge Patna/Bokaro me.

Best of luck
author: Srinjay  Kumar

text:
Hi be,

Hmlog shayad 1st dya hi mile the yaha pe. Department aur Hall same nhi tha to interaction bhi thoda kam tha but it was always good to have you. CCD me kaafi future planning kiye hm log. 2nd year se Mangalam aur Aalok Raj ko gyan dene me maja aata tha xD. 

Anyways, wish you all the best. Hopefully, we will meet again.

Best Wishes,
Srinjay
author: Srinjay  Kumar
